name: Frog's light
description:
Frog's light is a Puzzle game, the player is a frog trying to survive the night by engulfing fireflies.

Features

  • 8 levels
  • Pixel art
  • Grid-based
  • "F r o g"

Control

W A S D - Move frog / Move tongue

Spacebar - Enable / Pull tongue back

R - Reset the current level

Tools I used

  • Bleeper
  • SUNSHINE 35 PALETTE

Music by FREE MUSIC MAISON

Game created for Minijam 106
